title: Fans go ballistic after Wales defeats England
content:
A Welsh crowd erupted into rapturous applause in a Cardiff pub as they celebrated the team's victory over England. Irish fans also couldn't hide their excitement. Source: Rhys Hafod @Rhys_Hafod
